Nature of Delight.quote: "The joy of the Lord is your strength." (Nehemiah 8:10)

Divine Bliss.quote: "Ananda is Brahman - Bliss is the Ultimate Reality." (Taittiriya Upanishad 3.6.1)

Sacred Joy.quote: "In Your presence there is fullness of joy." (Psalm 16:11)

Spiritual Ecstasy.quote: "The drunkenness of the spirit is the sobriety of truth." (Rumi)

Divine Happiness.quote: "The Self is peace, the Self is supreme happiness." (Chandogya Upanishad 7.23.1)

Celestial Pleasure.quote: "Paradise is the garden of spiritual delights." (Hadith Qudsi)

Sacred Rapture.quote: "Those who delight in the law of the Lord prosper in all they do." (Psalm 1:2-3)

Divine Entertainment.quote: "The whole universe is the play of the Divine." (Sri Aurobindo)

Holy Celebration.quote: "Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!" (Philippians 4:4)

Divine Recreation.quote: "God rested from all his work which he had created and made." (Genesis 2:3)

Sacred Pleasure.quote: "Taste and see that the Lord is good." (Psalm 34:8)

Divine Satisfaction.quote: "I shall be satisfied with Your likeness when I awake." (Psalm 17:15)

Spiritual Enjoyment.quote: "The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace..." (Galatians 5:22)

Divine Laughter.quote: "Then our mouth was filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing." (Psalm 126:2)

Sacred Sweetness.quote: "How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!" (Psalm 119:103)

Divine Play.quote: "Krishna's divine play enchants all beings." (Srimad Bhagavatam 10.33.36)

Heavenly Mirth.quote: "A merry heart does good like medicine." (Proverbs 17:22)

Divine Dance.quote: "The Lord your God will rejoice over you with dancing." (Zephaniah 3:17)

Sacred Festivals.quote: "These are the Lord's appointed festivals, the sacred assemblies." (Leviticus 23:4)

Divine Revelry.quote: "Let them praise His name with dancing." (Psalm 149:3)

Spiritual Games.quote: "The divine play (lila) is the joy of creation." (Vedanta Philosophy)

Holy Gladness.quote: "You have put gladness in my heart." (Psalm 4:7)

Divine Merriment.quote: "A time to weep, and a time to laugh." (Ecclesiastes 3:4)

Sacred Delight.quote: "I delight to do Your will, O my God." (Psalm 40:8)

Divine Celebration.quote: "This is the day the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it." (Psalm 118:24)

Spiritual Jubilation.quote: "Shout for joy to the Lord, all the earth." (Psalm 100:1)

Divine Exultation.quote: "My soul shall exult in my God." (Isaiah 61:10)

Sacred Happiness.quote: "Happy are the people whose God is the Lord." (Psalm 144:15)

Divine Cheer.quote: "Be of good cheer, I have overcome the world." (John 16:33)

Eternal Joy.quote: "Your joy no one will take from you." (John 16:22)
